About the Company: Virat Crane Inds. Ltd is engaged in the manufacturing of Gutka, Pan Masala and Fruit Masala. The company is also engaged in the manufacturing of ghee products through their subsidiary Durga Diary.The company has a landmark of achievement with premium products from the house of Crane, Crane Gutka and Crane Fruit Masala which are sensational favorites in South India.
